Key Findings: Elastic modulus ~198 GPa (163–229 GPa) and Young’s modulus 269 GPa measured.; elastic modulus varied from 186 to 215 GPa, overall mean 198 GPa; Mean indentation elastic modulus 294 ± 60 GPa; domain moduli 265–384 GPa and hardness 9.2–25.4 GPa.
Comments: Good reversibility and kinetics.; microscale heterogeneity observed in elastic modulus and hardness; Strong microscale heterogeneity; pre‑existing cracks lower macroscopic stiffness.
